title: Which Oscar Nominees Should Win This Year?
sub_head: WSJ critic Joe Morgenstern picks his favorite contenders across the Academy Award’s top six categories
body: William Goldman’s celebrated dictum was never more relevant: Nobody knows anything. Picking winners for this year’s Oscars following a year of unprecedented dislocation is a mug’s game—remember when everyone was saying Christopher Nolan’s “Tenet” would save the theatrical movie business?—and I’m the mug they told to do it. Looking at the list of Academy Award nominees, what strikes me most forcibly is how rich it is in talent, and how much I wish I had seen all those productions and performances on the big screens they were conceived for. Still, smaller screens didn’t diminish the accomplishments, so out comes my crystal ball, downsized for the occasion to a big marble. Here, my thoughts on who should, could or will take home Oscars in six of the top categories at the 93rd Academy Awards.
